verses.verse: Now when <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H3045>found<s%> out all that was <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> with <S%H665>ashes,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H2199>wailed<s%> <S%H1419>loudly<s%> and <S%H4751>bitterly.<s%>

He <S%H935>came<s%> even <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate,<s%> for no one is allowed <S%H935>inside<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H3830>clothed<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth.<s%>

In every <S%H4082>province,<s%> <S%H4725>wherever<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>commandment<s%> and his <S%H1697>decree<s%> <S%H5060>came,<s%> there was <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> among the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> and <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> and <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> and <S%H4553>wailing;<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3331>lay<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> and <S%H665>ashes.<s%>

<S%H635>Esther<s%>'s <S%H5291>maidens<s%> and her <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H4436>this,<s%> and the queen was <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H2342>grieved.<s%> She <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H899>clothing<s%> to <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> <S%H5493>to<s%> <S%H3847>replace<s%> his <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> but he <S%H6901>didn't<s%> receive it.

Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H2047>Hathach,<s%> one of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5631>eunuchs,<s%> whom he had <S%H5975>appointed<s%> to <S%H6440>attend<s%> <S%H6680>her,<s%> and commanded him to go to <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> to find out what this <S%H3045>was,<s%> and why it was.
So <S%H2047>Hathach<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> to <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7339>square<s%> which was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

<S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> him of all that had <S%H7136>happened<s%> to <S%H6575>him,<s%> and the exact sum of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that <S%H2001>Haman<s%> had <S%H559>promised<s%> to <S%H8254>pay<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1595>treasuries<s%> for the <S%H6>destruction<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

He also <S%H5414>gave<s%> him the <S%H6572>copy<s%> of the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of the <S%H1881>decree<s%> that was <S%H5414>given<s%> out in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H7200>them,<s%> to show it to <S%H635>Esther,<s%> and to <S%H5046>declare<s%> it to <S%H6680>her,<s%> and to urge her to go <S%H935>in<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> to make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> to <S%H1245>him,<s%> and to make request <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5971>him,<s%> for her people.
Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H2047>Hathach,<s%> and gave him a <S%H6680>message<s%> to <S%H4782>Mordecai:<s%>

"All the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> <S%H3045>know,<s%> that <S%H376>whoever,<s%> whether man or <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> without being <S%H7121>called,<s%> there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1881>law<s%> for <S%H4191>him,<s%> that he be put to death, <S%H905>except<s%> those to whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> might hold <S%H3447>out<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H8275>scepter,<s%> that he may <S%H2421>live.<s%> I have not been <S%H7121>called<s%> to come <S%H935>in<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> these <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>"

Then <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H559>asked<s%> them return <S%H7725>answer<s%> to <S%H635>Esther,<s%> <S%H1819>"Don't<s%> think to <S%H5315>yourself<s%> that you will <S%H4422>escape<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> any more than all the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

For if you <S%H2790>remain<s%> <S%H2790>silent<s%> <S%H6256>now,<s%> then <S%H7305>relief<s%> and <S%H2020>deliverance<s%> will <S%H5975>come<s%> to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> from <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> but you and your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> will <S%H6>perish.<s%> Who <S%H3045>knows<s%> if you <S%H5060>haven't<s%> come to the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> for such a time as <S%H6256>this?<s%>"

<S%H3212>"Go,<s%> gather <S%H3664>together<s%> all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who are <S%H4672>present<s%> in <S%H7800>Shushan,<s%> and <S%H6684>fast<s%> for <S%H398>me,<s%> and neither eat nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> or <S%H3117>day.<s%> I and my <S%H5291>maidens<s%> will also <S%H6684>fast<s%> the same <S%H3651>way.<s%> Then I will <S%H935>go<s%> in to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> which is against the <S%H1881>law;<s%> and if I <S%H6>perish,<s%> I <S%H6>perish.<s%>"
So <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> went his <S%H5674>way,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that <S%H635>Esther<s%> had commanded <S%H6680>him.<s%>
